abstract: Wells Fargo, whose planned purchase of Wachovia will create the largest U.S. retail branch banking network, said on Wednesday third-quarter profit fell 25 percent, hurt by higher credit losses and investment write-downs.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo, whose planned purchase of Wachovia will create the largest U.S. retail branch banking network, said on Wednesday third-quarter profit fell 25 percent, hurt by higher credit losses and investment write-downs.
